frontmatter.title: Aspera Quick Install
frontmatter.description: Quick install instructions for a MVP deployment of Aspera.

internal.content:
--- title: Aspera Quick Install description: Quick install instructions for a MVP deployment of Aspera. keywords: Aspera, MVP tags: Aspera, MVP --- import Server from './server' import Client from './client' import Optional from './optional' import ArticleDetails from '../../../components/ArticleDetails' These instructions are for a quick MVP traditional install of Aspera. The install is for the most basic client/server architecture available to support transfer between a client and a Linux server. For more detailed information and advanced configuration details please refer to the latest version of the [High Speed Transfer Server product documentation](https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/SSL85S).
![Basic Deployment](./images/basicAsperaDeployment.png)
